statements: UPDATE warehouse_performance_metrics SET total_sales = 5000 WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
UPDATE warehouse_performance_metrics SET total_shipments = 1000, warehouse_size = 5000 WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
UPDATE warehouse_performance_metrics SET total_sales = 15000, total_shipments = 200 WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
UPDATE warehouse_performance_metrics SET total_shipments = 180, warehouse_size = 5000, total_sales = 20000 WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
UPDATE warehouse_metrics SET total_sales = 10000, total_profit = 8000 WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
UPDATE warehouse_performance SET error_rate = 0.15, efficiency_score = 0.8 WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
UPDATE warehouse_metrics SET total_sales = 50000, total_profit = 30000 WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
UPDATE warehouse_performance SET error_rate = 0.05, efficiency_score = 0.9 WHERE warehouse_id = 2;
UPDATE warehouse_performance_metrics SET profit = 15000.00, expenses = 10000.50 WHERE warehouse_id = 1 AND metric_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE warehouse_sales_metrics SET average_order_value = 75.50, sales_total = 15000.00 WHERE metric_date = '2022-10-20' AND warehouse_id = 2;
UPDATE warehouse_performance_metrics SET revenue = 15000, expenses = 10000, profit = revenue - expenses WHERE warehouse_id = 1 AND metric_date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE warehouse_sales_metrics SET sales_total = 50000, average_order_value = 100, orders_count = sales_total / average_order_value WHERE warehouse_id = 2 AND metric_date = '2022-02-15';
UPDATE warehouse_performance_metrics SET total_sales = 50000.00, total_orders = 1000 WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_metrics SET sales_amount = 2500.75, sales_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE warehouse_id = 2 AND sales_id = 10;
UPDATE warehouse_performance_metrics SET total_sales = 50000.53, total_inventory = 100 WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_metrics SET product_name = 'New Product', quantity_on_hand = 50 WHERE warehouse_id = 2 AND inventory_id = 10;
UPDATE warehouse_sales SET total_sales = 15000.50 WHERE date = '2022-10-15'
UPDATE warehouse_inventory SET quantity = 100, last_updated = NOW() WHERE location = 'Zone A'
UPDATE warehouse_sales SET total_sales = total_sales + 500, quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE product_id = 100
UPDATE warehouse_inventory SET location = 'New York', quantity = quantity + 20, last_updated = '2022-01-20 10:00:00' WHERE product_id = 200
